abstract: Bankers are likely to make unusually large gains on the stock grants and options they received after shares in their companies fell sharply.
snippet: Bankers are likely to make unusually large gains on the stock grants and options they received after shares in their companies fell sharply.
lead_paragraph: Even as Washington tries to rein in Wall Street pay, bankers are likely to make unusually large gains on the stock grants and options they received after shares in their companies fell sharply during the financial meltdown.

headline.main: Windfall Seen as Bank Bonuses Are Paid in Stock
headline.print_headline: Windfall Seen as Banks Give Bonuses in Stock
